external_references.description: M. Porolli. (2021, January 21). Operation Spalax: Targeted malware attacks in Colombia. Retrieved September 16, 2022.

description: For [Operation Spalax](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0005), the threat actors staged malware and malicious files in legitimate hosting services such as OneDrive or MediaFire.(Citation: ESET Operation Spalax Jan 2021)
